name: Underwater Perils by Presley Hoyl
description:
Underwater Perils is a 3D game in which a jellyfish goes on a journey through an underwater cave system, eating krill along the way, to figure out what's behind a light in the ocean.

Features

  • Natural enemies of the jellyfish as dangers
  • Ocean-like cave environment with textured terrain
  • Path-following jump mechanic

Work

  • I started with a theme of "flowy" and created a moodboard to create the game concept
I took lighting, colors, and objects that fit the idea of flow and brought them together into this board.
  • I took 3D models of the caves and enemies and arranged them in a level progression.
  • I created a color gradient and used the Averia font to create game UI.
  • I added music and level sounds that followed the atmosphere of my theme.
